description: A sustainable reimagining of Mountain Hardwear's best-selling ultralight down jacket: The Ghost Whisperer/2™ now features 100% recycled shell fabric, with the same 800-fill Hydrophobic down insulation and extremely light, highly packable layering performance that shines on and off route.
name: Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer/2 Vest - Mens

specs.value: 800-Fill RDS®-Certified Down - 90% Goose Down, 10% Goose Feather
